section.title: The introductory part
section.p: This is the homepage of ConExp. This page answers your questions on the tool itself, how to use it, how to get in contact with us and many things more.
The web site is subdivided into three part. The General gets you in contact with the FCA comunity and provides all informations you need to download and install the software.
To answer your questions on how to use ConExp, we refere to the User folder. It provides a complete documentation and soon it will contain tutorials.
The folder Developers gives you an impression on persons involed in the project, an overview in which direction we want to develope the tool and an opportunity to help or even join us.
The responsibily for everthing on this page for this page and the tool ConExp takes Serhiy Yevtushenko, who can be reached by sergey.at.intellektik.informatik.tu-darmstadt.de
